abstract: An automatically ending action that you want to perform on a vehicle.
overview:
## Overview

Use a [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/RemoteKeylessEntryAction] object to store details about an action that runs to completion after you start it. For example, you might use this type of action to unlock the door locks of the vehicle. The object stores information about the feature you want to control and the action to take on that feature. It also stores the identifier for the vehicle itself.

After you create a [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/RemoteKeylessEntryAction] object, call your session’s [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/CarKeyRemoteControlSession/perform(_:)-8ac0c] method to execute the action. Use the returned [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/RemoteKeylessEntryAction/ExecutionRequest] object to determine the success or failure of the request.

# RemoteKeylessEntryAction

**Structure**

An automatically ending action that you want to perform on a vehicle.

## Declaration

```swift
struct RemoteKeylessEntryAction
```

## Overview

Use a [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/RemoteKeylessEntryAction] object to store details about an action that runs to completion after you start it. For example, you might use this type of action to unlock the door locks of the vehicle. The object stores information about the feature you want to control and the action to take on that feature. It also stores the identifier for the vehicle itself.

After you create a [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/RemoteKeylessEntryAction] object, call your session’s [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/CarKeyRemoteControlSession/perform(_:)-8ac0c] method to execute the action. Use the returned [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/RemoteKeylessEntryAction/ExecutionRequest] object to determine the success or failure of the request.

## Creating the Action Request

- **init(functionID:actionID:vehicleID:)**: Creates a new action object with the specified action-specific details and vehicle ID.

## Receiving the Action’s Response

- **RemoteKeylessEntryAction.ExecutionRequest**: An object that reports the results of an automatically ending action asynchronously.

## Getting the Action Details

- **functionID**: The vehicle-specific code that identifies which feature you want to control.
- **actionID**: The vehicle-specific code that identifies what action to take on the targeted feature.
- **recipientVehicleID**: The vehicle to receive the action request.

## Vehicle Actions

- **RemoteKeylessEntryEnduringAction**: An action with an optional stopping point that you want to perform on a vehicle.
- **FunctionIdentifier**: A type that stores the designation code for one of your vehicle’s features.
- **ActionIdentifier**: A type that stores the designation code for one of the actions that a vehicle feature supports.
